PupPal

The ultimate habit tracker app to help you build and maintain good habits. Track your progress, stay motivated, and achieve your goals.

Track your habits
Monitor your progress with intuitive tile-based grid charts.
Customization
Add your habits you want to track in a fast and easy way.
Streaks
Get motivation from streaks.
Reminders
Never miss a completion again and add reminders to your habits.
Multiple Themes
Choose between different themes and toggle between dark and light mode.
Calendar
The calendar provides a fast and easy way to manage past completions.
Archive
Do you need a break from a habit and don't want to clutter your dashboard with it? Just archive it.
Import / Export
Switching phones and don't want to lose your data? Export your data to a file.
Privacy
All your data belongs to you and stays on your phone.

Nicolò Borghi
